name: Baseball Emojis Nation
description:
Talk about Baseball with cool Emojis!

When words just can’t express how you truly feel about all the amazing homerun, crappy strikeout or BIG let downs playing ball, use Baseball Emoji’s and you will never be at a lose for words ever again!

Express yourself the largest, most comprehensive Baseball emoji/sticker collection available in the App Store with over 100+ awesome emojis/animations to enjoy and share.

Available in the new iMessage App Store as well.

Features include
- Share 100+ Amazing Baseball Emojis/Stickers
- Share 90+ Awesome Baseball Animations
- Share 10+ Funny Animated Text Images
- Easy step-by-step instructions for installing and using the keyboard
- iMessage compatible
- Share any emoji/sticker to others who do not have the app
- Easily share the app with others - with one button press on the keyboard
- ALLOW FULL ACCESS NOTE: Do not worry, allowing permission for Full Access is required for all keyboards. We - DO NOT save any of your information.

You can still use the app, if you do not want to give us full access. You will download it from the iMessage App Store and can fully use all emoji as stickers.

Next time you want to share the empire unfair call or cheer on your team for a grand slam, use Baseball Emojis Nations.
